name: Shortcut
description: Creates a shortcut to a file or URL.

Name.description: The name of the shortcut as displayed to the user.

Directory.description: Directory where the shortcut is created. Defaults to parent directory.

Target.description: Target of the shortcut. Defaults to parent File.

Arguments.description: Command line arguments for the shortcut.

IconIndex.description: Index of the icon in the icon file.

Advertise.description: If yes, creates an advertised shortcut.

Show.description: Window state when shortcut is launched.

examples.code: <Shortcut Id="AppShortcut" Name="My Application" Directory="ProgramMenuFolder" WorkingDirectory="INSTALLFOLDER" Advertise="yes" />
